metadata.name: Segmented Mausoleum
metadata.description:
The segmented Mausoleum feature from Antibirth has returned!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/k6GKh7u.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/sOyzXnO.png[/img] [list] [*]𝐒𝐞𝐠𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐌𝐚𝐮𝐬𝐨𝐥𝐞𝐮𝐦 [*][u][COMING SOON][/u] 𝐒𝐞𝐠𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐆𝐞𝐡𝐞𝐧𝐧𝐚 [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/g21z6Za.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫, 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/im_tem]im_tem[/url] [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u]= [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/im_tem]im_tem[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/3en8OyU.png[/img] [code]Aether, Akad, ALADAR, Andre Doruk, Blind the Bound Demon, Blixy, BrakeDude, cat,,, Firework, fly_6, Goncholito, im_tem, Kars, KitsuneMedia, kittenchilly, Kotry, lambchop_is_ok, Luigi124, Michael¿?, PixelPlz, poody_blue, Sillst, sinbiscuit, Soaring__Sky, The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/code]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SlXbHql.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xd2eafr.png[/img] [code][u]_Kilburn[/u] - For the original Segmented Mausoleum concept [u]Preyn[/u] - For stylistic inspiration in the image gallery [u]All of you[/u] - For checking us out and supporting us :)[/code]
